attributes.action: publicly censure Mr Jack Straw for not supporting Magistrate Ian Murray in upholding english common law in that facial coverings intended for use in concealing identity are not permitted to be worn in our courts of law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
